item.description:
Pour House has invited us one more time to their after work VIP Party. Come join us for food, drinks, mix and mingle. We'll have our own roped off section. There'll be complimentary buffet of finger food.

Please check in and get your name tag when you arrive and as always, update your RSVP if your plans change.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the downstairs bar area. Tell them you are with Bao's group.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: After Work VIP Party (Tuesday - March 19, 2013)
